plot: A hasty decision comes back to haunt Betty; Tensions between Hiram, FP and Jughead spiral out of control; Archie is forced to make a tough decision.

Betty turns to Jughead for help when the aftermath of the shady man's arrival causes her to spiral. A series of desperate attempts to tie up loose ends leads to a dark confrontation. Hal becomes increasingly suspicious of Chic's shady activities, while Cheryl grows uneasy about her mother's affair with Hal. Veronica organizes a face-to-face meeting after tensions between Hiram, FP and Jughead spiral out of control. When Sierra becomes an obstacle and the Lodges form a plan to "take care" of her, Veronica stops playing by her parents' game and makes a bold move. Archie is forced to make a tough decision after Agent Adams takes things one step too far, leading to a confrontation and a revelation at a private meeting spot.—snowflakeaudrey
